earring.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a piece of jewellery that you wear on your ear
earring.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She was wearing a pair of beautiful diamond earrings.
earring.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: He bought her some expensive diamond earrings.
I put on some gold dangly earrings.
a pair of large silver hoop earrings
She was wearing gold earrings and a diamond necklace.
I forgot to put on my new earrings.
